name: Attic
longDesc:
You are in the ATTIC.
There is an exit in the floor that drops down into the UPSTAIRS HALLWAY.
On the opposite wall, a chimney for the living room fireplace
goes up through the roof.
description:
You are in the ATTIC.
There is an exit in the floor that drops down into the UPSTAIRS HALLWAY.

chest of drawers.name: chest of drawers
chest of drawers.description: The chest of drawers is an antique with a matching mirror above it.

rug.name: rug
rug.description: The rug is old and unraveling.
rug.discoveryStatement: There is a THREAD you can PULL. That might come in handy.

thread.name: thread
thread.description: A long, loose thread from the unraveling rug.

mirror.name: mirror
mirror.description:
The mirror is old, gilded, and cracked, with scorch marks running across it.
You don't remember those being there before.

notebook.name: notebook
notebook.description: The well-worn notebook is stuffed with extra pieces of paper.
notebook.discoveryStatement: A green piece of PAPER has slid almost all the way out of the notebook.

paper.name: paper
paper.description:
The top of the paper says 'TO DO - FIX DE-SHRINK FUNCTION ON SHRINK RAY!!!'.
Underneath that is a list of random things:
     shampoo, dirty socks, aluminum can, couch stuffing,
     sand, screw from back of refrigerator, corn flakes,
     copper wire from back of TV, candle,
     'de-shrink' software from the computer in basement lab

exitBlock:
you would fall straight down to the hallway floor
since there are no stairs. You'll need to find a way to lower yourself down
